name: Street Fighter X Tekken
description: The long awaited dream match-up between the two titans of fighting is here!
minimum_requirements: Minimum Requirements at 800x600 resolution @ 30FPS): OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Dual Core 1.8GHz (or higher) or AMD Athlon II X2 (or higher)  Memory: 1GB (or higher) Hard Disk Space: 10GB of free space  Video Card: nVidia GF6600 (or higher) or ATi X1600 (or higher) with 256MB of RAM DirectX®: 9.0c Sound: DirectSound compatible, DirectX 9.0c (or higher) compatible         Other Requirements: Online play requires software installation of and log-in to Games For Windows - LIVE
recommended_requirements: Recommended Requirements at 1280x720 resolution @ 60FPS): OS: Windows Vista, 7 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.60GHz (or higher) or AMD Phenom II X2 (or higher) Memory: 2GB Hard Disk Space: 10GB of free space Video Card: nVidia GF8800 (or higher) or ATi X1950 (or higher)  with 512MB of RAM  DirectX®: 9.0c Sound: DirectSound compatible, DirectX 9.0c (or higher) compatible

reviews.review_text: Don't Buy!  This game is great! Worth buying, but it no longer works. I've tried to uninstall and reintall, and nothing. I've call the capcom support number, left messages with a call back number. Nothing. I'm the a computer type of guy and I'm not confident enough to try to fix the game myself.   Save your money. Buy something else. My review will change when I'm actually able to play this. Don't buy!
Was hoping to use Tekken moves with the Tekken characters but no, it's Street Fighter orientated controls. Great if you like SF, but I'm a Tekken fan at heart.

After purchase I had to go online for a fix to get the game to boot. After that I find that I have been lied to due to the game being listed as Multiplayer.  No multiplayer or support anywhere listed on the title or steam.  Still trying to work out how to get my money back as this is not on!
- Not compatible with Win8 at all. Not a single bit. 0%. Does not work. 0/10 not compatible.  + Boobs

I write this review with just over an hour clocked in this game, but rest assured, the full hour was spent getting Games For Windows Live to work with Windows 10.  A simple process of uninstalling all instances of it, restarting your machine, manually downloading the client, installing it in compatibility mode for Windows 7 and running it as an administrator, restarting your machine, putting in your credentials, click on the 'Click here to resolve problems with your account' button when you are unable to log in, log in through Internet Explorer, discover that this process doesn't work, input your credentials, click on 'Give me a new account', accept the new terms of service for xbox, go back to the client and log in, start the game, log in, download your profile, download an update for games for windows live, close the game to install it, restart the client, log in, restart the game, log in, download your profile, accept all the notifications from the game, and then you're good to go!  5/7 would log in again
This game doesn't work on Windows 10? It won't start, stuck on black screen.
Screw windows live... and don't get me started on the dlc

Online mode is broken, lag issues that can't be avoided due to bad netcode and certain modes crash the game.  GFWL drm that complicates install and will soon be disable rendering the broken online completely non functional.  PC version missing DLC costumes that are available on consoles.  PC version based on 360 version that is missing content exclusive to PS3.  PC version inherting bugs from the flawed 360 port.  No signs of any support from Capcom for this game.  On top of all these isssues with the PC version the game itself isn't very good, an inferior Street Fighter IV.  AVOID AVOID AVOID
It's a good game, it is truly a shame it is utterly unplayable online.  Also, it's Street Fighter feat. Tekken, because it works just like any SF game.

I was able to get the game working only after using a third party .dll to bypass GFWL, which unfortunately means I cannot go online. This is unacceptable. Capcom should be ashamed of not putting forth the base effort of stripping the need for GFWL from the game if they're going to still happily sell it to people. It's an alright game otherwise. A fighting game novelty more than anything. Still, even at it's cheapest, because of GFWL, I cannot recommend this game to anyone.
Skip this & go straight for Ultra. Still infected with the cancer that is GFWL.
SFxT Community patch fixed this game for single and co-op play. Well done from saving me from GFWL. It's a lot of fun! Sadly no online play. Good B'E'U.
A good fighting game with good GFWL multiplayer stability on the PC platform. Also includes loads of gem customisation options for those who really want to get into it.
I like it. It's the only Tekken fighting at Steam. I like characters, customization and game mechanics. Also, GWFL wasn't problem for me, it works perfect.

This game isn't that bad but I feel there are better fighter games out there. The combo system feels limited. You can mix between punches and kicks and up in strength Light > Medium > Heavy for 3 attacks, then a 'Launch'. Then a bunch of single special moves, and then 2 throws (forward and back throw). Theres also these quick combos you activate with just 2 buttons if you have enough energy, you can set 2 different pre-made combos from a list of like 6 in the menu.  So overall I feel its not fluid combo system. The game is also so fast it seems like you need to input all your buttons before hes even done with the first swing. Naturally I feel like I want to pause for the attack animation to finish before I input another button into the combo but instead you need to push them all as fast as possible. Also things like countering a throw with a throw seem crazy hard considering how fast the game is going.  The AI on some charecters on arcade seem better then others. Like the Guile & Abel team. Guile throws sonic booms, waits for you to get in range and tears you up. Abel just walks endlessly at you and leaves himself open for medium hits. That was the worst team I noticed but I havn't faced them all yet.   The graphics, audio and charecter models are really good. Bryan, Hwoarang, Dalsim, Yoshimitsu, King look amazing. Bryan acting like a complete sciopath I find kinda weird. But then Law, Blanka, Paul, and somewhat Guile for exmaple look like they came from some bizzaro cartoon world. The rest are pretty good.  The Gem system is kinda cool as you can customize your charecter slightly before you go into a fight. I don't like how the better gems and combos can only be gotten by the DLC. I hate DLC, they should just update you that content for already buying the game.  I am a Tekken fan and this game doesn't bring a lot of Tekken to the table. Overall it would be great to play on versus with someone at your house or at a party but in general I wouldn't get it unless it was on sale for atleast 50%.  Lasty I get a constant screen tearing line across the middle whie I play, It gets pretty annoying. My fps is always stuck at around 60 even with Vsync off; the ingame benchmark runs at 300+ fps but normal gameplay is always 60. Vsync, Fixed/Variable framerate, Single gpu mode, nothing gets rid of the line.
Great game, awkward to get running in windows 10

Ok lets get something straight here people. Yes GFWL, shut down making it almost impossible or work heavy just to get the game back and running again. BUT, that doesn't mean it didn't have potential beforehand or it 'sucked' all because it had GFWL running.   Before the GFWL Shutdown: - Great gameplay - Amazing graphics - Real simple controls although yes more SF oriented controls than Tekken - Awesome DLCs and great storylines - Really gets you going sometimes - Fun for everyone else in the family who loves SF and Tekken  After the GFWL Shutdown: - You can't say anything really after this incident - The game doesn't work for DLCs or any pack after this occured - Only worth playing for Offline ( as in against someone in your house ) not multiplayer - A lot of work just to try and get it working  Sum up: Not like it didn't have potential, it had everything going for it and good gameplay/graphics just as I mentioned before, but do not and I repeat do not hate on this game just because GFWL closed down on it. Now yes I do recommend not buying it unless you don't mind the simple characters already given to you and playing with a friend or family member in the household, and the time consuming process of just getting it to work with GFWL Marketplace version. If you want to hate on something hate on the GFWL services, but not the game people. Learn from what's really causing it and not hating on the game itself cause of something else. If there was a 'Somewhat or Maybe' button for 'Do you recommend this game?' then I would've chosen that.
Game does not work on Windows 10. Game will crash system and will require a reboot.
they should've brought marvel on pc instead of this. it's probably dead also EDIT: gfwl was needed to play online, but now that it's down you can't, and capcom doesn't do ♥♥♥♥ about it. ♥♥♥♥ you.
Nothing to see here folks. Dan isn't a playable character.
only co-op fighting game ever!
Doesn't work, support listed isn't even capcom don't buy

Better than Street Fighter IV despite the fact that it has several characters missing from both franchises (E. Honda and Eddie Gordo off of the top of my head). It's a decent game but has bad netcode if you want to play online, not to mention that you have to use Games for Windows Live if you want to play it. That app is dying though, so perhaps those problems will be solved when it rightfully craps out. If you want it for single player, I can fully recommend it though. As with all fighting games, make sure you have a game pad. Compared to Street Fighter 4, I pefer this, it just feels better made and the AI doesn't out and out spam you with cheap attacks all the time. 6/10 is my score. It's a competant Street Fighter game - a game which I think that I may be outgrowing because nothing ever changes, nor can it without ruining anything. The Tekken characters have simplified moves to fit with the aging franchise of SF, which may annoy Tekken players out there.
punch someone in the face already!!!
Rather play ssf4 AE, but I'm gonna recomend just to support more fighting games on pc.
The best 2-on-2 fighting experience
Game requires a window live account.
Game force closes after intro logos. Comp surpasses recommended settings. I've tried every fix I could find with no improvement. If you can run it, enjoy.
Do not purchase fails to start
very good game but not as good as ssf4 ultra.

Hey guys! You big fans of Street Fighter? How about Tekken! Well have we got the game for you!! Ultra Street Fighter IV is available right here on Steam! Also did you hear? Tekken 7 and Street Fighter V are on the way!
This game is decent, but...  GFWL.

I'm going to be honest, This is a really good game. Believe it or not, I find the characters for Tekken to be quite challenging, New moves and all. Netcode is a bit meh, Combos are quite easy to do once you get the hang of it, Not much people play this game, and I can understand why. I'd recommend this though. go for it!
Fun fighting game. Some of the mechanics are horribly broken and/or unbalanced, but it is a ton of fun to play with friends.
Does not work AT ALL without community patches. Hate risking viruses. The game itself is fun if you get it working. Plenty of DLC if you want to waste money on PTW gems too.
Poorly executed and dissapionting for both the casual fan and the competitive fighting game player.
street fighter a legend game no denid
i downloaded this game and my screens black anyone can help me? thank you was looking forwrd to playing
This is the best Gatorade commercial ever

I think I just bought this for the hotness of Poison (who looks female enough to me).  It's one of those wierd purchases that you'll like sitting on your shelf more than taking it out to use.  Pros: Rich roster, stylish asthetic. Cons: Doesn't stray from street fighter much. DLC for colors! Potentially disappointing combat for Tekken fans.  6.5/10

Im not happy that this game stopped working and that you can't play the multiplayer because GFWL is no longer in place. This needs to be patched and fixed or refund the money of the people that purchased this game period. I cannot recommend this game to PC gamers, even tho its a great game.

Game is pretty cool and recommend to friends. Would like to battle you guys. This game plays like Street Fighter 4 and others, not like Tekken. The characters are unlocked from the start. I am playing this with Xbox controller. One problem I had was loading the game at first because it has something to do with game for windows live I think? There is a fix to download online and place in game folder that fixed my problem. Overall fun game for multiplayer.

I wanted to like this game so badly but I just couldn't   Its a very poorly made Fighting game  Terrible servers for online, Stupid Battle point system for ranked matches, Lots of characters can lock you into a spam with 0 chance of escape, takes 15 mins average to find a online match.  You are not able to get better at this game either or juggle due to terrible physics.  If you try hitting with a High attack more then twice you cannont continue with mid endless you follow up with a 'Generic' Low.
I this is the number 1 fightgame of karategametype i know for pc . :D
this game is okay if you like getting your ♥♥♥ kicked by a bunch of computer nerds lol! other wise i would avoid it. graphics are crap and story line is pathetic but i still kinda like it wtf?
This is the greatest newbie friendly game of All Time.

As a fighting game puritan I think this is easily one of the best fighting games to come out in a very long time. It rests upon a foundation of fresh ideas, features an insane amount of characters, has a unique style and enough new moves and mechanics to keep you busy for hundreds of hours. An excellent buy if you're looking for something that's different, polished and generally really sexy.

Whats to say. Take two of the most popular fighters and throw them into a Tag Tournament (essentailly what it is. Tekken Tag with Street Fighter Mechanics) The only thing that could make this better is if they release an update called:  Marvel vs Capcom vs Street Fighter X Tekken vs Mortal Kombat vs SNK  I would LOVE to be able to team Tizok (Garou) & Yoshimitsu. My two all time favorite fighters in the genre.  Any complaints? Eeeeh, limitations with Customization of Characters. Its a small complaint, just colour combinations is a little boring, some accessories wouldnt have been too much to ask. Then again, add too much and I guess they'd rename the game to Street Figter X Tekken Fortress 2 (HA! See, See what I did there? ... Funny Huh? ... Over used joke? Naaah)  HATS ingame = Team Fortress Joke.  ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~   Blah blah. SO. Buy this game. Beat ♥♥♥♥ up. Shoryuken and 'The pipes are broooken' to your hearts content.  'Would anybody like some... Poundcake?!' 'Id like some PouuunnndCake!'  ~EgoRaptor (Youtube it)
Game is a little rough around the edges. The game play is solid though and easy for a new player to fighting games to pick up.
Fighting game better with xbox controller
Almost pre-ordered it before it came out... Glad I waited untill the sale. This game is ♥♥♥♥ing amazing. Worth the $50 pricetag.
hangs all the time i try to open ,

It still works without Games for Windows Live, and it's a great crossover fighting game.  You can't save without Games for Windows Live, but you don't need to save in a fighting game. Also, DLC-buyers got screwed by the Games for Windows Live shutdown.  Rest of the game works, so I play.

not bad game at all fun for playing with friends need more aussies for playing online but is fun anyhow. they have given the tekken characters alot of street fighter moves and mixed them together nicely.
Everyone has already said it. Don't buy this game.     Originally posted by  BridgetFisher :

I downloaded the Tekken complete pack and it has fatal error and I could not run it so I straight away asked for refund as no solution to it was publised or one was for too many steps of installation from other sources. Not good.

Thanks to a patch from Steam User Carlmundo this game is playable again!  The multi-player portion tho no longer works at all with or without the patch. It has something to do with windows dropping live........ so you will only be able to beat up on your friends if they are sitting next to ya.....  If you buy this game go to the community hub and find Carlmundos patch before you even play the game.  It's a great game. If you like 2d fighters bnuy it when it goes on sale. I like this one more than SF 4 or SF 5.   ----Original Review ----- This is utter BS....... I bought all the DLC for this game and I can't access it because of some garbage with games For Windows Live.  If you are wanting to play this game today you should spend a few hundred hours readsing about all the things you are going to need to do, including downloading cracked versions of the software, in order to access your own content.  SFxT is the best argument for piracy that has ever been made.  If this is on sale for 10 cents stay away from it.

I was fortunate enough to pick this up during the holiday sale. My only real gripes with this game is that there's not enough people playing it (mostly because of Capcom's unscrupulous, money-grubbing DLC practices) and that there's no Pac-Man and Mega Man in the DLC pack like in the console versions of the game.  Unfortunately, after the holiday special, this game went right back to being ridiculously overpriced. However, if you happen to have disposable income or this game finds itself on sale again, I would definitely recommend checking it out.
